transforms.code:
#Create list
	datas = []

	#loop through value list
	for key in value:
		#Create dict
		data={}
	
		#Fill dict
		data['key'] = key
		data['selected'] = True
	
		#Append dict to list
		datas.append(data)

	#Return list
	return datas

messageHandlers.script:
#get payload info
	tableName = payload['tblName']
	row = payload['row']
	col = payload['col']
	val = payload['value']

	#check if update is for this table
	if tableName == "SearchTbl":
		if row != -1:
			#update row data
			self.props.data[row][col] = val
		else:
			#update all row data
			lenData = len(self.props.data)
			for row in range(lenData):
				self.props.data[row][col] = val

config.script:
#Get info
	keys = self.getSibling("Table").props.data

	#Create message infos
	messageType='addSelectedKey'
	payload = {'keys':keys}

	#Send message
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload)

transforms.code:
instances = []
	#Append all languanges option
	#All always first
	instance ={
	  "locale": "All",
	  "isAll":True,
	  "name":"All"
	}
	instances.append(instance)
	#english always second
	instance ={
	  "locale": "en",
	  "isAll":False,
	  "name":"English"
	}
	instances.append(instance)
	
	locals = sorted(value)
	for local in locals:
		#Don't do english since it will always be in second possition
		if local != "en":
			instance ={
			  "locale": local,
			  "isAll": False,
			  "name": self.view.rootContainer.localToName(local)
			  }
			instances.append(instance)
	return instances

config.script:
#Ask for search filter on table
	self.view.rootContainer.search()

customMethods.name: getAllTranslations
getAvailableKeys
customMethods.script:
#import package
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import IgnitionGateway
	package = IgnitionGateway.get().getLocalizationManager().loadFullPackage()

	#Get keys
	keys = package.getAvailableKeys()
	return keys

customMethods.name: getAvailableLocals
customMethods.script:
#import package
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import IgnitionGateway
	package = IgnitionGateway.get().getLocalizationManager().loadFullPackage()

	#Get locals
	locals = package.getAvailableLocales()
	return locals

customMethods.name: delLocal
customMethods.script:
#import package
	from org.apache.commons.lang3 import LocaleUtils
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import IgnitionGateway
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.i18n.translation import TranslationPackageDiff
	
	#Set local
	translationLocale = LocaleUtils.toLocale(local)
	
	#set translationdiff package
	modifications = TranslationPackageDiff()
	
	#remove locale
	modifications.removeLocale(translationLocale)
	
	#Apply change
	IgnitionGateway.get().getLocalizationManager().applyDiff(modifications)

customMethods.name: addLocal
customMethods.script:
#import package
	from org.apache.commons.lang3 import LocaleUtils
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import IgnitionGateway
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.i18n.translation import TranslationPackageDiff
	
	#Set local
	translationLocale = LocaleUtils.toLocale(local)
	
	#set translationdiff package
	modifications = TranslationPackageDiff()
	
	#remove locale
	modifications.ensureLocaleExists(translationLocale)
	
	#Apply change
	IgnitionGateway.get().getLocalizationManager().applyDiff(modifications)

customMethods.name: refreshData
customMethods.script:
#Refresh terms
	self.view.refreshBinding("custom.TranslationTerms")
	
	# Collapse all expanded subviews.
	self.getChild("TabContainer").getChild("Modify").getChild("Table").collapseSubviews()

	#Only refresh selected local if method is ALL
	if refreshMethod == "ALL":
		#Unselect all
		#self.view.custom.SelectedLocale = []
		messageType = "isUnselected"
		payload= {'locale':"All",
				  'isAll':True}
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, scope="page")

customMethods.name: isCaseInsensitive
isIgnorePunct
isIgnoreTags
isIgnoreWS
getKeyHashRule
customMethods.script:
#Get has rules
	keyHashRule = {
		"caseInsensitive":self.view.rootContainer.isCaseInsensitive(),
		"ignorePunct":self.view.rootContainer.isIgnorePunct(),
		"ignoreTags":self.view.rootContainer.isIgnoreTags(),
		"ignoreWS":self.view.rootContainer.isIgnoreWS()
	}
	
	#return
	return keyHashRule

customMethods.name: exportTranslations
customMethods.script:
#Get translations
	try:
		translates = {}
		translates["translations"] = self.view.rootContainer.getAllTranslations()
		#translates["keyHashRule"] = self.view.rootContainer.getKeyHashRule()
		#convert
		translates=system.util.jsonEncode(translates)
		self.view.custom.key = translates
		
		#download json file
		system.perspective.download('translate.json', translates,'text/plain')

	except Exception as e:
		raise Exception(e)

customMethods.name: addKey
customMethods.script:
#import package
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import IgnitionGateway
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.i18n.translation import TranslationPackageDiff
	
	#set translationdiff package
	modifications = TranslationPackageDiff()

	#Apply change
	IgnitionGateway.get().getLocalizationManager().applyDiff(modifications)

customMethods.name: localToName
addTranslation
customMethods.script:
#import package
	from org.apache.commons.lang3 import LocaleUtils
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import IgnitionGateway
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.i18n.translation import TranslationPackageDiff
	
	#set locale
	translationLocale = LocaleUtils.toLocale(local)
	
	#set translationdiff package
	modifications = TranslationPackageDiff()
	
	#set modifications
	modifications.addTranslation(term, translationLocale, translation)
	
	#Apply modification
	IgnitionGateway.get().getLocalizationManager().applyDiff(modifications)

customMethods.name: delTranslation
customMethods.script:
#import package
	from org.apache.commons.lang3 import LocaleUtils
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import IgnitionGateway
	from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.i18n.translation import TranslationPackageDiff
	
	#set locale
	translationLocale = LocaleUtils.toLocale(local)
	
	#set translationdiff package
	modifications = TranslationPackageDiff()
	
	#set modifications
	modifications.removeTranslation(term, translationLocale)
	
	#Apply modification
	IgnitionGateway.get().getLocalizationManager().applyDiff(modifications)

customMethods.name: search
customMethods.script:
#toggle table filter
	self.getChild("Table").props.filter.enabled = not self.getChild("Table").props.filter.enabled
	
	#Make sure filter text is empty
	self.getChild("Table").props.filter.text = ''

customMethods.name: getProjects
customMethods.script:
#create return list
	rets = []
	#Get projects list
	projects = system.project.getProjectNames()

	#Loop through project list
	for project in projects:
		#create dict
		ret = {}
	
		#Fill dict
		ret['label'] = project
		ret['value'] = project
	
		#Append dict to list
		rets.append(ret)

	#Return List
	return rets

customMethods.name: searchKey

messageHandlers.script:
#Get payload
	locale = payload['locale']
	action = payload['action']
	
	#Get list
	data =self.view.custom.SelectedLocale
	
	#Action true = add, action false = remove
	if action:
		if locale not in data:
			data.append(locale)
	else:
		if locale in data:
			data.remove(locale)
	
	#Set list
	self.view.custom.SelectedLocale = data

#Get Payload infos
	local = payload['local']
	
	#delete local
	self.view.rootContainer.delLocal(local)
	
	#close popup
	id = 'DelLanguage'
	system.perspective.closePopup(id)
		
	#refresh data
	self.view.rootContainer.refreshData("ALL")

#Get Payload infos
	key = payload['key']
	
	#delete local
	self.view.rootContainer.delKey(key)
	
	#close popup
	id = 'DelKey'
	system.perspective.closePopup(id)
		
	#refresh data
	self.view.rootContainer.refreshData("DELKEY")

#Get Payload infos
	key = payload['key']
	
	#add key
	self.view.rootContainer.addKey(key)
	
	#close popup
	id = 'AddKey'
	system.perspective.closePopup(id)
		
	#refresh data
	self.view.rootContainer.refreshData("ADDKEY")

#Get Payload infos
	local = payload['local']
	
	#delete local
	self.view.rootContainer.addLocal(local)
	
	#close popup
	id = 'AddLanguage'
	system.perspective.closePopup(id)
	
	#refresh data
	self.view.rootContainer.refreshData("ALL")

#get json info
	jsonTranslate = payload['json']
	
	#ask import translations
	self.view.rootContainer.importTranslations(jsonTranslate)
	
	#close popup
	id = 'ImportTranslations'
	system.perspective.closePopup(id)

	#refresh data
	self.view.rootContainer.refreshData("IMPORTTRANSLATION")

#get payload info's
	local = payload['local']
	term = payload['term']
	translation = payload['translation']
	
	#ask add translation
	self.view.rootContainer.addTranslation(local,term,translation)
	
	#refresh data
	self.view.rootContainer.refreshData("ADDTRANSLATION")

#get payload info's
	local = payload['local']
	term = payload['term']
	
	#ask del translation
	self.view.rootContainer.delTranslation(local,term)

	#refresh data
	self.view.rootContainer.refreshData("DELTRANSLATION")

#Set searching flag
	self.view.custom.searchingKey = True

	#get payload info's
	project = payload['project']
	keysToChk = payload['keysToChk']

	#ask search key
	keys=self.view.rootContainer.searchKey(project,keysToChk)

	#return find keys
	self.view.custom.searchKey = keys

	#Reset searching flag
	self.view.custom.searchingKey = False

#Get Payload infos
	keys = payload['keys']
	
	#add key is selected
	for key in keys:
		if key['selected']:
			self.view.rootContainer.addKey(key['key'])

	#Refresh
	self.view.rootContainer.refreshData("")
